thread.title: President of Hebrew Union College Dies in Plane Crash

author: Mike Vilensky
title: President of Hebrew Union College Dies in Plane Crash

organizations.name: hebrew union college-jewish institute of religion

text:
The president of Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institute of Religion, a leading Jewish seminary, died in a small plane crash on Saturday, the institute said.
Rabbi Aaron Panken was 53 years old and the 12th president in the school’s 143-year history. He was widely known as a leader of Reform Judaism and led the Jewish Institute’s four campuses.
The...
